Command.Name: CmdPaste
Command.TooltipDescription: Paste the contents of the Clipboard.

Command.Name: CmdPasteSpecial
Command.TooltipDescription: Paste special (Alt+Ctrl+V)

Command.Name: CmdCut
Command.TooltipDescription: Cut the selection from the document and put it on the Clipboard.

Command.Name: CmdCopy
Command.TooltipDescription: Copy the selection and put it on the Clipboard

Command.Name: CmdOutdent
Command.TooltipDescription: Decrease the indent level of the paragraph.

Command.Name: CmdIndent
Command.TooltipDescription: Increase the indent level of the paragraph.

Command.Name: CmdList
Command.TooltipDescription: Click the arrow to choose different list styles.

Command.Name: CmdLineSpacing
Command.TooltipDescription: Change the spacing between lines of text. Add or remove the space after paragraphs.

Command.Name: CmdAlignLeft
Command.TooltipDescription: Align text to the left.

Command.Name: CmdAlignCenter
Command.TooltipDescription: Center text.

Command.Name: CmdAlignRight
Command.TooltipDescription: Align text to the right.

Command.Name: CmdAlignJustify
Command.TooltipDescription: Align text to both left and right margins, adding extra space between words as necessary. This creates a clean look along the left and right side of the page.

Command.Name: CmdParagraph
Command.TooltipDescription: Show the Paragraph dialog box.

Command.Name: CmdInsertPicture
Command.TooltipDescription: Insert a picture from a file.

Command.Name: CmdChangePicture
Command.TooltipDescription: Change to a different picture, preserving the formatting and size of the current picture.

Command.Name: CmdResizePicture
Command.TooltipDescription: Scale height and width of current picture with aspect ratio locked or independently.

Command.Name: CmdPaintDrawing
Command.TooltipDescription: Insert draing created in Microsoft Paint.

Command.Name: CmdDateAndTime
Command.TooltipDescription: Click here for date and time format options

Command.Name: CmdInsertObject
Command.TooltipDescription: Show the Insert object dialog box.

Command.Name: CmdFind
Command.TooltipDescription: Find text in the document.

Command.Name: CmdReplace
Command.TooltipDescription: Replace text in the document.

Command.Name: CmdSelectAll
Command.TooltipDescription: Select all (Ctrl+H)

Command.Name: CmdZoomIn
Command.TooltipDescription: Zoom in on the document.

Command.Name: CmdZoomOut
Command.TooltipDescription: Zoom out on the document.

Command.Name: CmdZoom100Percent
Command.TooltipDescription: Zoom the document to 100% of the normal size.

Command.Name: CmdRuler
Command.TooltipDescription: Show or hide ruler. You can use ruler to measure and line up text and objects in the document.

Command.Name: CmdStatusBar
Command.TooltipDescription: Show or hide status bar at the bottom of the window.

Command.Name: CmdWordWrap
Command.TooltipDescription: Select word wrapping option to change how text appears on your screen. This does not affect how the document looks when you print it.

Command.Name: CmdNoWrap
Command.TooltipDescription: No text wrapping.

Command.Name: CmdWrapToWindow
Command.TooltipDescription: Wrap text to window.

Command.Name: CmdWrapToRuler
Command.TooltipDescription: Wrap text to ruler.

Command.Name: CmdMeasurementUnits
Command.TooltipDescription: Select measurement units for ruler and page setup.

Command.Name: CmdNew
Command.TooltipDescription: Create a new document.

Command.Name: CmdOpen
Command.TooltipDescription: Open an existing document.

Command.Name: CmdSave
Command.TooltipDescription: Save the active document.

Command.Name: CmdSaveAs
Command.TooltipDescription: Save the document with a new name or format.

Command.Name: CmdHeaderSave
Command.LabelTitle: Save a copy of the document

Command.Name: CmdRichTextDocument
Command.LabelDescription: Save the document in the Rich Text format.

Command.Name: CmdOfficeOpenXMLDocument
Command.LabelDescription: Save the document in the Office Open XML format.

Command.Name: CmdOpenDocumentText
Command.LabelDescription: Save the document in the OpenDocument format.

Command.Name: CmdPlainTextDocument
Command.LabelDescription: Save the document as plain text without line breaks or formatting.

Command.Name: CmdOtherFormats
Command.LabelDescription: Open the Save as dialog box to select from all possible file types.

Command.Name: CmdPrint
Command.LabelDescription: Select printer, number of copies and other printing options before printing.
Command.TooltipDescription: Print the current document.

Command.Name: CmdQuickPrint
Command.LabelDescription: Send the document directly to the default printer without making changes.

Command.Name: CmdPrintPreview
Command.LabelDescription: Preview and make changes to pages before printing.

Command.Name: CmdPageSetup
Command.TooltipDescription: Change page layout settings.

Command.Name: CmdEmail
Command.TooltipDescription: Send a copy of the document in an e-mail message as an attachment.

Command.Name: CmdExit
Command.TooltipDescription: Exit WordPad

Command.Name: CmdViewOnePage
Command.TooltipDescription: Zoom the document so that an entire page fits in the window.

Command.Name: CmdViewTwoPages
Command.TooltipDescription: Zoom the document so that two pages fit in the window.

Command.Name: CmdPreviousPage
Command.TooltipDescription: Navigate to the previous page of the document.

Command.Name: CmdNextPage
Command.TooltipDescription: Navigate to the next page in the document.

Command.Name: CmdClosePrintPreview
Command.TooltipDescription: Close print preview and return to editing the document.

Command.Name: CmdUndo
Command.TooltipDescription: Reverses the last action.

Command.Name: CmdRedo
Command.TooltipDescription: Repeats the last action.

Command.Name: CmdHelp
Command.TooltipDescription: Get help using WordPad.
